title: This guy makes skins better then most of Riots

embed.description: FINAL (?) version of my fan-made VFX for DARK STAR Lux. All feedback is greatly welcome! :) Some news: will go back to my country soon, so I'll be busy and without a computer for at least two weeks. No videos for those two weeks, sorry everyone!

replies.body: The visual effects are insanely detailed. This guy has some real talent, riot hire this man

My friend did the audio engineering for this guy's Battlecast Jhin video.
and I've written some potential lines for an upcoming one of his skins too. 

This guy is legitimately amazing!!
Wait, but what does it look like when you early detonate your E like a normal person?

i love how darkstar lux fanskin has a better indicator of how wide her ult laser is. Like there I can clearly see how far I need to move to dodge it whereas it's so easy to get clipped with the regular ingame skins and die even though it looked like you were safe.
Those are some nice skins holy moly.
